title: Desktop Application Info
subtitle: Information about the desktop application
description: This application is running as a desktop application using Tauri.
webDescription: This application is running in a web browser, but can also be used as a desktop application.
tauriDescription: Tauri allows us to build lightweight, secure desktop applications using web technologies. This means we can use the same codebase for both web and desktop applications.
downloadInfo: Want to use this as a desktop app?
downloadDescription: You can download the desktop version of this application for Windows, macOS, or Linux. The desktop version provides additional features like file system access and improved performance.
